Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Biological Response Modifier/Vaccine/Antineoplastic Vaccine/Anti-Idiotype Vaccine/Unconjugated Myeloma Ig Id
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Synonym: Unconjugated Myleoma Immunoglobulin IG ID Vaccine
Record.Description: A vaccine consisting of myeloma-specific immunoglobulin that is not conjugated to a carrier molecule. Vaccination with unconjugated myeloma Ig Id may stimulate the host immune system to mount a cytotoxic T lymphocyte (CTL) response against myeloma cells, resulting in decreased tumor growth. (NCI04)
